name: Walrein ex
author: Kimiya Masago

poke_body.name: Icy Aura
poke_body.effect: As long as Walrein ex is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s) between turns, excluding {W} Pokémon.

attacks.name: Water Arrow
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Ice Throw
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is a {F} Pokémon, this attack’s base damage is 120 instead of 80.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
